ygData.subject: Re: Lv 20 Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: The closest place for you, friend gnome, would be in Felwithe, home of the High Elves.  The guilds there have quite a few spells.  Failing that, take the boat
ygData.messageBody:
The closest place for you, friend gnome, would be in Felwithe, home of the
High Elves. The guilds there have quite a few spells. Failing that, take
the boat to Freeport and check the Academy of Arcane Sciences. Farther out
still is the Hall of Sorcery in Qeynos, and farther still is the Library of
Erudin.


----- Original Message -----
From: Zinken <zinken@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 16, 1998 8:20 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Lv 20 Spells


> From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
>
> Hi
>
>
> I gained lv 20 now and raced home to Akkanon to get my new spells, i did
only find one there. :-((( where can i get the rest ?. The one i found was
force shock.
>
>
> Thanks for help :-)
>
> / Askur Lv 20 Wizard of Veeshan
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
>
